value.title: Create a Regression Model with Azure Machine Learning designer
value.excerpt: Regression is a supervised machine learning technique used to predict numeric values. Learn how to create regression models using Azure Machine Learning designer.

value.title: Predict categories with machine learning classification
value.excerpt: Use machine learning models to categorize data. Build a logistic regression model and support vector machine models to predict categories like win/loss and tree species.

images.title: Predict categories with machine learning classification

value.title: Predict numeric values with regression
value.excerpt: Use machine learning regression models to predict numeric values. Build multiple variations of linear regression models to estimate things like internet traffic.

value.title: Create a classification model with Azure Machine Learning designer
value.excerpt: Classification is a supervised machine learning technique used to predict categories or classes. Learn how to create classification models using Azure Machine Learning designer.

value.title: Define an AI strategy to create business value
value.excerpt: Explore the strategic components, use cases, and special factors of an enterprise AI strategy that creates real business value, with INSEAD and Microsoft.

value.title: Understand the importance of building an AI-ready culture
value.excerpt: Understand the key elements that make a culture AI-ready and a framework to drive the change needed in your organization for a successful AI strategy.

value.title: Describe Azure Databricks
value.excerpt: Describe Azure Databricks

value.title: Identify guiding principles for responsible AI
value.excerpt: Explore six principles to guide AI development and use - fairness, reliability and safety, privacy and security, inclusiveness, transparency, and accountability

value.title: Introduction to AI technology for business leaders
value.excerpt: This learning path helps business leaders discover and describe the primary concepts of AI, and the transformational impact AI can have in their organization.

topItems.title: Introduction to AI technology
topItems.excerpt: Learn the primary concepts and technologies of AI, and how Microsoft is turning the latest AI into tools, products, and services that organizations can leverage

topItems.title: Examine the Microsoft approach to artificial intelligence
topItems.excerpt: Learn how Microsoft creates products, services, and solutions to help organizations leverage AI. Understand how these technologies relate to business problems.

value.title: Introduction to AI technology
value.excerpt: Learn the primary concepts and technologies of AI, and how Microsoft is turning the latest AI into tools, products, and services that organizations can leverage

value.title: Introduction to the Azure Machine Learning SDK
value.excerpt: Azure Machine Learning provides a cloud-based platform for training, deploying, and managing machine learning models.

value.title: Spark architecture fundamentals
value.excerpt: Spark architecture fundamentals

value.title: Work with Compute in Azure Machine Learning
value.excerpt: Learn how to manage compute contexts for experiments in Azure Machine Learning.

value.title: Cognitive Search - Azure Search with AI | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Jacob Jedryszek joins Scott Hanselman to talk about about using Cognitive Services with Azure Search with your mobile and web apps. Skip hiring search experts who know what an inverted index is. Don't worry about distributed systems expertise to scale your service to handle large amount of data. And
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/6kw8SHwxp9c" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: How to make your data searchable with Azure Search and AI | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, you'll learn how to make your data searchable with Azure Search and AI. Creating compelling search experiences is hard. Azure Search provides search as a service and makes it easy to let AI analyze your data and enhance your results.    For more tips and tricks,
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/OQDRNQD1LDk" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Automate machine learning model selection with Azure Machine Learning
value.excerpt: Learn how to use automated machine learning in Azure Machine Learning to find the best model for your data.

value.title: Microsoft Azure Artificial Intelligence (AI) strategy and solutions
value.excerpt: This module provides an overview of Azure AI and demonstrates how Microsoft tools, services, and infrastructure can help make AI real for your organization, whether you want to unlock insights from your latent data with knowledge mining, develop your own AI models with machine learning, or build immersive apps using AI.

value.title: Configure 3D assets for mixed reality in Unity
value.excerpt: Get step-by-step instructions on how to place Prefab 3D assets and models into a Unity scene. Learn about Unity Scriptable Objects and mixed reality design considerations before deploying to a HoloLens 2.

value.title: Process images with the Computer Vision service
value.excerpt: Use the Computer Vision API to analyze images for insights, extract text from images, and generate high-quality thumbnails.

value.title: Deploy batch inference pipelines with Azure Machine Learning
value.excerpt: Machine learning models are often used to generate predictions from large numbers of observations in a batch process. To accomplish this, you can use Azure Machine Learning to publish a batch inference pipeline.

value.title: Identify faces and expressions by using the Computer Vision API in Azure Cognitive Services
value.excerpt: Learn how to use the Computer Vision API in Azure to identify facial details in pictures

value.title: Introduction to Azure Machine Learning
value.excerpt: Azure Machine Learning provides your software with automated data identification and extraction from your documents. Using an SDK or REST, the AI-powered service decreases, or can completely eliminate, time spent on and errors in data entry, while also making it easier to utilize your data.

value.title: Introduction to Mixed Reality
value.excerpt: Mixed Reality is transforming the nature of on-the-job training, game development, and consumer application development. Build a foundation in the core concepts, terminology, and design processes unique to the augmented reality, virtual reality, and Mixed Reality development space. Get familiar with HoloLens, Windows Mixed Reality immersive headsets, bodystorming prototypes, and the most common use-cases for Mixed Reality content.

value.title: Synthesize Text Input to Speech
value.excerpt: Learn how to synthesize text to speech using the Speech-to-Text service.

value.title: Train a machine learning model with Azure Machine Learning
value.excerpt: Learn how to use Azure Machine Learning to train a model and register it in a workspace.

value.title: Tune hyperparameters with Azure Machine Learning
value.excerpt: Choosing optimal hyperparameter values for model training can be difficult, and usually involved a great deal of trial and error. With Azure Machine Learning, you can leverage cloud-scale experiments to tune hyperparameters.

value.title: Work with Data in Azure Machine Learning
value.excerpt: Learn how to work with datastores and datasets in Azure Machine Learning.

value.title: How to get started with Azure Machine Learning Service | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, learn how to get started with the Azure Machine Learning Service and how you can use it from Visual Studio Code.   For more tips and tricks, visit: http://azuredev.tips  Get started with 12 months of free services and $200 USD in credit.  Create your free account
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/8EGJP7RPe1A" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Create conversational AI solutions
value.excerpt: Conversational AI revolves around user interactions, in this case through Bots. In this learning path, you will learn how to create chat bots and integrate the bot with various AI services to add intelligence to the interaction. Learn how to integrate the QnA Maker Service (an easy method to add question and answers for bots), and explore the new Virtual Assistant scenarios for creating branded experiences with bots.

topItems.title: Build a chat bot with the Azure portal
topItems.excerpt: Create and test a basic chat bot using the Azure portal

topItems.title: Design a bot conversation flow
topItems.excerpt: Learn the principles of good bot design and implement conversational flows, knowledge bots, and how to hand-off interactions to a human.

topItems.title: Create a Bot with the Bot Framework Composer
topItems.excerpt: User the Bot Framework Composer to quickly and easily build sophisticated conversational bots without writing code.

value.title: Define an AI strategy to create business value in healthcare
value.excerpt: Explore the strategic components, special factors, and use cases of an AI strategy in healthcare that creates business value, with INSEAD and Microsoft.
